cause.description:
This is a cause for which donations might do nothing however if ever someone should donate then donate your time to learn how to communicate clearly, and if you insist then I would have loved to find a similar organization aiming at Iraq Egypt or even the whole Middle East, Sudan though is also a good choice. We should start somewhere.
1. العربى لا يقراء بالابجدىة اللا تينية
2. English is unreadable if written with an Arabic Alphabet
3. Same idea applies for all Human languages
cause.mission: keep www clear and understandable for all
cause.name: Fed up زهقنا
